Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. Definitely A Must See, Please Call/WhatsApp DE RM MOTORS To View All Vehicle,

2.    All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check
3.    Over 4,000 popular makes and models of used cars available
4.    Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5.    Finance available with all banks
